item.name: Acorn
item.description: A natural food, ingredient, bait or seed.

item.name: Bread
item.description: A baked food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Fungus
item.description: A peculiar food, ingredient or remedy against poison.

item.name: Cheese
item.description: A yummy food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Piou Legs
item.description: A tender food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Lettuce Leaf
item.description: A healthy food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Piberries
item.description: The famous staining fruit.

item.name: Sea Drops
item.description: Yucky drops of salt water.

item.name: Aquada
item.description: A nutritious fruit of the sea.

item.name: Pink Blobime
item.description: Yucky pink mucus of little blub.

item.name: Purple Blobime
item.description: Stinky purple mucus of blub.

item.name: Half Croconut
item.description: Its inside seems delicious.

item.name: Croconut
item.description: Fallen from a crocotree, this fruit could be opened.

item.name: Old Book
item.description: A book that threatens to fall apart in your hands as you carefully browse the pages.

item.name: Plushroom
item.description: A strange remedy of many possible uses.

item.name: Pumpkin Seeds
item.description: Yucky seeds that threaten to grow out-of-control.

item.name: Delicious Cookie
item.description: This is a reward from the Cookie Master. Be careful before you eat it, its effects are unknown...

item.name: Urchin Meat
item.description: A seafood ingredient.

item.name: Easter Egg
item.description: A chocolate shell covered in a very thin metal layer.

item.name: Piberries Infusion
item.description: A potion made from piberries.

item.name: Fate's Potion
item.description: An effective blood-loss remedy.

item.name: Clotho Liquor
item.description: Remedy used in feral warrior training sessions.

item.name: Lachesis Brew
item.description: Rare, powerful and restricted remedy.

item.name: Atropos Mixture
item.description: The most advanced potion ever synthesized.

item.name: Elixir Of Life
item.description: A potion able to restore even dead trees to life.

item.name: Iron Shovel
item.description: Discover treasures, dungeons and raw materials.

item.name: Pumpkin Juice
item.description: Blood-colored juice from madly swarming pumpkin.

item.name: Manana
item.description: A fast healing fruit.

item.name: Curshroom
item.description: A strange remedy of many possible uses, cures poison.

item.name: Carrot
item.description: Good in various recipes.

item.name: Red Plush Wine
item.description: Wine produced from black grapes in the south-east of Aurora.

item.name: Piou and The Fluffy
item.description: This story is a warning against listening to flattery.

item.name: Poem about Poems
item.description: A heart touching poem written by Nard.

item.name: Chorus of the Woods
item.description: This poem was written centuries ago and is from the ancient city of Keshlam.

item.name: Communication Theory
item.description: Various meta explanations regarding the dialogue system.

item.name: Fluffy Animals who Love Their Owners
item.description: A quick guide to introduce pet caring.

item.name: The Book of Laws
item.description: The basic laws respected and upheld in all parts of Gasaron.

item.name: Fishing Guide Vol. I
item.description: A small book that covers the basics of fishing.

item.name: Recipe Book
item.description: A small book with all the culinary wonders you have collected.

item.name: Master Book
item.description: The book which knows all mana secrets, reserved only for masters.

item.name: Carp Sandwich
item.description: A yummy sandwich, made with a fresh carp.

item.name: Piouleg Sandwich
item.description: A typical Artis food. How can you just eat these little Pious?

item.name: Manana Sandwich
item.description: A vegetarian sandwich, for those who like it.

item.name: Beer
item.description: Just a beer, nothing else. Don`t drink and drive!

item.name: Roasted Maggot
item.description: a maggot, roasted on fire. Mmh, crunchy!

item.name: Bottle of Water
item.description: Fresh springwater from Hurnscald area. Healthy!

item.name: Cherry Cake
item.description: If you like sweets, you will love this homemade cherry cake.

item.name: Small Healing Potion
item.description: A small Healing Potion for little wounds.

item.name: Medium Healing Potion
item.description: A medium Healing Potion for painful wounds. Slightly addictive, handle with care.

item.name: Large Healing Potion
item.description: A large Healing Potion. To countermand involuntary amputations.

item.name: Small Mana Potion
item.description: A small Mana Potion for 'Not-at-all-a-Mage' players.

item.name: Medium Mana Potion
item.description: A medium Mana Potion for the Sorcerer's Apprentice.

item.name: Large Mana Potion
item.description: A large Mana Potion for the magic Ones..

item.name: Concentration Potion
item.description: A Potion to make you faster, and to make your attacks hit with higher accuracy.

item.name: Iron Potion
item.description: This potion contains powderized Iron. It makes you strong and resistant against physical attacks.

item.name: Fertility Potion
item.description: A bottle containing some magical fertilizer, used for making soil fruitful again.
item.effect: Better dont drink it, it could be toxic.

item.name: Honey
item.description: A glass full of the finest honey. Enjoy it, and don't forget to thank the bees!

item.name: Small Tentacles
item.description: Colorful tentacles with poisonous barbs.

item.name: Piou Feathers
item.description: Small feathers of an innocent little piou.

item.name: Tortuga Shell Fragment
item.description: Used to make tools and decorations.

item.name: Half Eggshell
item.description: Maybe something hatched, or someone was cooked...

item.name: Ratto Tail
item.description: Hairless tail of a ratto.

item.name: Ratto Teeth
item.description: Sharp incisors of a ratto.

item.name: Croc Claw
item.description: It moves and pinches without its body.

item.name: Squichy Claws
item.description: Claws from a wild Squichy.

item.name: Tortuga Shell
item.description: A symbol of shelter.

item.name: Tortuga Tongue
item.description: Adept to digesting blubs.

item.name: Pearl
item.description: A beautiful round and shiny pearl.

item.name: Coral
item.description: Can indicate the health of oceanic ecosystems.

item.name: Blue Coral
item.description: A coral dyed in blue by a blub.

item.name: Fish Box
item.description: A wooden box full of fresh fish that Couwan gave you.

item.name: Aquada Box
item.description: Contains 50 aquadas.

item.name: Croconut Box
item.description: Contains 17 croconuts.

item.name: Plushroom Box
item.description: Contains 87 plushrooms.

item.name: Poisoned Dish
item.description: A special dish made of strange ingredients.

item.name: La Johanne's Key
item.description: An iron key to open La Johanne's entrance door.

item.name: Left Crafty Wing
item.description: This wing is slight and soft unlike its former owner.

item.name: Bat Teeth
item.description: What sharp teeth! They seem to be more dangerous than a knife.

item.name: Right Crafty Wing
item.description: This wing is slight and soft unlike its former owner.

item.name: Pumpkin
item.description: An invasive species, sometimes carved during festivals.

item.name: Mushroom Spores
item.description: Some colored spores that help mushrooms spread across the land.

item.name: Moss
item.description: Grows in moist, shady areas.

item.name: Tentacles
item.description: Boneless appendage of an invertebrate.

item.name: Common Carp
item.description: Freshwater is commonly inhabited by these pests.

item.name: Grass Carp
item.description: A smart fish, very difficult to catch.

item.name: Fishing Rod
item.description: Designed for sports fishing.

item.name: Fluffy Fur
item.description: This soft fur is used to make warm clothing.

item.name: Clan Certification
item.description: This piece of paper grants you official permission to found a clan.

item.name: Empty Bottle
item.description: An empty bottle, clean and ready to be filled.

item.name: Raw Log
item.description: A somehow strange piece of wood.

item.name: Pink Antennae
item.description: An Antennae, as Pinkies wear it on their heads.

item.name: Empty Mug
item.description: This Tea Mug is pretty empty.

item.name: Pink Petal
item.description: A fragile Petal with an aromatic smell.

item.name: Pile of Ash
item.description: A handfull of Ash with unknown origin.

item.name: Alizarin Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Cobalt Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Gamboge Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Mauve Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Gold Nuggets
item.description: A few valuable pieces of gold.

item.name: Coal
item.description: Coal. Black and dirty.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.description: Iron Ore. Hard and heavy.

item.name: Maggot Slime
item.description: Slimy maggot slime.

item.name: Bug Leg
item.description: You busted a gut for getting this, right?

item.name: Hard Spike
item.description: Spiky Spine from a strange mushroom.

item.name: Silk Cocoon
item.description: Very thin and soft.

item.name: Red Rose
item.description: A beautiful red rose. Be careful, it has thorns!

item.name: White Rose
item.description: A beautiful white rose. Be careful, it has thorns!

item.name: Yellow Rose
item.description: A beautiful yellow rose. Be careful, it has thorns!

item.name: Blue Rose
item.description: A blue rose. You haven't seen blue roses before. Where might they grow?

item.name: Red Tulip
item.description: A nice red tulip. It smells nice.

item.name: White Tulip
item.description: A beautiful white tulip. Whom could you present it?

item.name: Yellow Tulip
item.description: A yellow tulip. I seems to be not really fresh.

item.name: Blue Tulip
item.description: A shiny blue tulip. There must be a creative grower of flowers somewhere around.

item.name: Coin Bag
item.description: A bag full of coins. They were most probably stolen from someone.

item.name: Diamond Shard
item.description: A small diamond shard.

item.name: Ruby Shard
item.description: A small ruby shard.

item.name: Emerald Shard
item.description: A small emerald shard.

item.name: Sapphire Shard
item.description: A small sapphire shard.

item.name: Topaz Shard
item.description: A small topaz shard.

item.name: Amethyst Shard
item.description: A small amethyst shard.

item.name: %Color% Necklace (Copper)
item.description: A %color% necklace, made of copper.

item.name: Creased Shirt
item.description: A spare shirt from the crew of La Johanne.

item.name: %Color% V-neck Jumper
item.description: A simple %color% jumper made from a lightweight cashmere.

item.name: %Color% Artis Tank Top
item.description: A %color% tank top made from cotton cloth.

item.name: Sailor Shirt
item.description: Proof that ye be in the crew, matey!

item.name: Legion's Training Shirt
item.description: Informal shirt worn during intense aerobic exercises.

item.name: Legion's Copper Armor
item.description: This armor provides great protection. It is worn by those with authority.

item.name: Forest Armor
item.description: An Armor made for hunting.

item.name: Silk Robe
item.description: A light robe out of silk. Does not provide much protection, though.

item.name: %Color% Fine Dress
item.description: A fine %Color% dress for the Lady or the Gentleman of today.

item.name: Warlord Plate
item.description: Strong and decorative armor.

item.name: Lousy Moccasins
item.description: Crudely assembled footwear not for comfort nor fashion.

item.name: %Color% Cotton Boots
item.description: A pair of %color% quality cotton boots.

item.name: Fur Boots
item.description: A pair of warming boots, made with fluffy fur.

item.name: Fur Boots
item.description: A pair of light, sneaky boots. Good to sneak without being noisy.

item.name: Armbands
item.description: Small armbands made of wood and iron.

item.name: Copper Armbands
item.description: Sturdy, combat-issue armbands.

item.name: Iron Armbands
item.description: Heavy armbands that slow down all but experienced warriors.

item.name: %Color% Cotton Gloves
item.description: A pair of comfy, %color% cotton gloves.

item.name: Leather Gloves
item.description: Gloves made of hardened leather.

item.name: Bandit Gloves
item.description: Gloves made soft leather, perfect for stealing or backstabbing.

item.name: Creased Shorts
item.description: Spare shorts from the crew of La Johanne.

item.name: Brown Trousers
item.description: Classic trousers ornated with some fluffy fur.

item.name: Jeans Chaps
item.description: Jeans with snake skin chaps.

item.name: %Color% Cashmere Pants
item.description: A very light fancy pair of %Color% cashmere trousers.

item.name: %Color% Cotton Skirt
item.description: A %color% skirt made of simple cotton.

item.name: Leather Trousers
item.description: A common pair of pants made from leather.

item.name: Bandit Trousers
item.description: Not really odoriferous trousers, formerly worn by some stinky bandit.

item.name: Barrel
item.description: It smells as if somebody used to live inside this barrel...

item.name: Leather Shield
item.description: Small and round leather shield with iron reinforcement.

item.name: Wooden Shield
item.description: A shield made of wood.

item.name: Steel Shield
item.description: A shield made of steel.

item.name: Bandana
item.description: A striped bandana worn by some sailors.

item.name: Pumpkin Hat
item.description: A carved pumpkin. Its face might scare your enemy off!

item.name: Fancy Hat
item.description: Worn when living away from cities.

item.name: Brimmed Hat
item.description: Unequip when indoors, please.

item.name: Brimmed Feather Hat
item.description: Distinguishes someone who is traveling.

item.name: Brimmed Flower Hat
item.description: To wear at festivals and certain events.

item.name: infantry Helmet
item.description: A helmet for soldiers and guards.

item.name: Candle Helmet
item.description: Worn by spelunkers.

item.name: Warlord Helmet
item.description: Worn by great warriors!

item.name: Axe Hat
item.description: A really cool joke, but not very helpful.

item.name: Pinkie Hat
item.description: With this, you'll fit right in with those strange pinkies.

item.name: Top Hat
item.description: For the gentry of The Mana World, and other worlds.

item.name: Bowler Hat
item.description: A hat for those with a bit of class.

item.name: Fairy Hat
item.description: Worn by people that are living and hunting in the woods.

item.name: Noh Mask
item.description: A traditional chinese Noh Mask.

item.name: Rosehat
item.description: A hat made out of a rose. You cant be sure whether this is the proper usage for a rose.

item.name: Bandit Hood
item.description: A woolen hood, very useful to hide your face from too curious constables, for example.

item.name: Shemagh
item.description: An improved scarf used by mercenaries in tough environments.

item.name: Bandit Shawl
item.description: A shawl, more for hiding you face than for keeping you warm.

item.name: Knife
item.description: A simple, but sharp knife.

item.name: Piou Slayer
item.description: A short sword for amateurs.

item.name: Training Gladius
item.description: A short sword made for close combat.

item.name: Wooden Sword
item.description: For sword training. Do not show-off with it.

item.name: Artis Backsword
item.description: An engraved backsword with the symbole of Artis on its brass hilt.

item.name: Training Wand
item.description: A simple wand for your first steps in handling magic.

item.name: Mana Torch
item.description: A simple wand imbued with a fire spell, it can provide lighting and will never run out on you!

item.name: Scythe
item.description: A farmer's scythe, not new but still deadly.

item.name: Dagger
item.description: Use to stab.

item.name: Setzer
item.description: A knife named after a famous gambler.

item.name: Pickaxe
item.description: A common pickaxe, not so good for battle but suitable for mining.

item.name: Torch
item.description: A burning Torch. Handle with care.

item.name: Axe
item.description: A rusty axe, made for chopping trees rather than battle.

item.name: Chopstick
item.description: A long chopstick, simple but effective for smashing.

item.name: Piou egg
item.description: Piou egg. Not for omelettes!

item.name: Diamond
item.description: A diamond, polished and shining.

item.name: Ruby
item.description: A polished ruby, blinking in bright red color.

item.name: Emerald
item.description: A polished Emerald, beautiful and green.

item.name: Sapphire
item.description: A polished sapphire, blinking in dark blue.

item.name: Topaz
item.description: A Topaz, polished and beautiful.

item.name: Amethyst
item.description: A polished Amethyst. Some say it has the power to heal.

item.description: A crude diamond, fresh from the mines.

item.name: Training Bow
item.description: For bow training. Does not seem much reliable.

item.name: Short Bow
item.description: The shortest of them all, and almost a knife, but the only which hits at point-blank range.

item.description: A big bow, to hunt monsters in the forest.

item.description: For bow training. Does not seem much reliable.
